Name: Light
Description: Struct used to store data on the lights in the scene.

Variables.Name: position
Variables.Description: The position of the light in world space.

Variables.Name: range
Variables.Description: The maximum distance that the light can affect objects.

Methods.Name: Light (Constructor)
Methods.Description: Sets initial values for Light variables.

Parameters.Name: position
Parameters.Description: The position of the light in world space, set to the origin by default.

Parameters.Name: color
Parameters.Description: The color of the light, set to the black by default and must be changed for the light to affect anything.

Parameters.Name: range
Parameters.Description: The range of the light, this affects how far away an surface can be and still be affected by the light, set to 0.0f by default and must be changed for the light to affect anything.
